settings.title: WE VISIT YOU WEEKLY, AND CALL OUR CUSTOMERS OUR FRIENDS. MEET THE ENTIRE TEAM ON ROTATION FOR EVERYTHING FROM DELIVERY TO SERVICING YOUR EQUIPMENT.
Re-use and minimise waste wherever possible
Build ethical relationships with the people who provide our beans
we do things differently
settings.subtitle:
It all starts with finding your perfect cup of coffee. Once we’ve nailed that, we can build up a flavour profile that’s bespoke to your business.

And it’s no coincidence that our bevy of blends and seasonal premium coffees means we hit every headline flavour square on the nose.

settings.title: weekly visits
settings.content: Seeing every customer week in, week out is a non-negotiable for us – it’s how we get to call our customers friends. And we ensure you see every one of our team on rotation, giving you unrivalled access to our individual expertise. From delivering your beans and servicing your equipment to providing technical support, our team will be there.

settings.title: shop layout
settings.content: Whether you covet a classic setup or something completely unique, we’ll work with you to design a coffee bar that delivers a seamless flow.

settings.title: training programme
settings.content: As members of the Speciality Coffee Association (SCA), we’ve taught over 1,000 budding baristas skills and brewing modules from foundation to professional level.

settings.title: equipment
settings.content: Our extended family of trusted suppliers means you’ll get VIP access to some of the most impressive names in coffee engineering. We’re talking La Marzocco, Mahlkönig, Marco, Ratio 6, BWT, Hario and Loveramics, to name a few.

settings.title: OUR KICKS COME FROM SERVICE, NOT SALES
settings.subtitle: And our hands-on expertise means we cover every inch of your coffee business.

settings.title: sustainability
settings.subtitle: From ensuring our supply chains are ethically robust, to using environmentally friendly takeaway containers, we’re committed to the sustainability of the coffee industry and our planet.

settings.title: Kirby
settings.subtitle: CO-FOUNDER
settings.copy:
Kirby’s love for good food started young – his earliest memories set in the kitchen of his parents’ hotel. A former squash player (Australian No. 1 and National Under-19s Champion), he always knew his path would lead back to hospitality.

His work ethic is formidable, but his philosophy simple – family first. And he’s proud to call the Roasting Party team 'family'.

settings.title: Ivan
settings.subtitle: HEAD OF TRAINING AND SERVICE
settings.copy:
Originally hailing from the shores of Lake Como (not the George Clooney side), luckily for us Ivan took the leap to leave Italy, and his engineering degree, to pursue his love for hospitality.

Over the past 4 years, Ivan has trained over 1,000 budding baristas in all things Roasting Party.

settings.title: Luke
settings.subtitle: HEAD OF WHOLESALE
settings.copy:
Luke’s been partying with us since 2016, looking after all things wholesale, as well as getting stuck in with the roasts. A former golf club pro and another of our squash champs, he’s a team player through and through.

Luke’s first day on the coffee circuit was spent being trained by the formidable Gwilym Davies (World Barista Champion 2009 and a pioneer of speciality coffee in the UK), before rising through the ranks in both commercial and premium coffee roles.

settings.title: George
settings.subtitle: FINANCIAL CONTROLLER
settings.copy: George is known for doing some seriously heavy lifting, and we don’t mean keeping our team in check. As a nationally competing power lifter, she trains 4/5 times a week and boasts some impressive stats. Most days you’ll find George's dog (and our roastery mascot), Ernie, stretched out under her desk.

settings.title: Hannah
settings.subtitle: ACCOUNT MANAGER
settings.copy:
Hannah came to us as a speciality coffee rookie. Completing her training with flying colours, she went on to become Co-Manager of all our London sites.

A cricket-loving Kiwi, Hannah loves to travel to find new friends, adventures, and spontaneous tattoos.

settings.title: Tim
settings.subtitle: LONDON STORES MANAGER
settings.copy:
We’ve been lucky enough to have Tim on board since we opened on Pavilion Road in 2017.

Since then, his star quality has been recognised by London’s theatrical elite, and he now lists Motown the Musical on his resume, alongside a teaching role at a London stage school.

Luckily for us, when he’s not treading the boards in the West End, he can still be found serving cracking coffees across all our London locations.

settings.title: Kitty
settings.subtitle: LOGISTICS
settings.copy:
If you’ve ordered coffee online, it’s probably been picked, packed and posted by Kitty. 

Our unofficial artist in residence, she brings colour, creativity, and party-starting playlists to the roastery. We’ll have a cup of whatever she’s having.

settings.title: Jamie & Clayton
settings.subtitle: HEAD CHEFS
settings.copy:
Our chefs bring decades of experience to the table, trained in Michelin-awarded restaurants and vegan cuisine.

Outside of the kitchen, they’re a creative pair – Clayton a collage artist, Jamie a yogi. Each brings their own eclectic flair to our menu, but both agree on a few key principles – bold, vibrant flavours and the very best seasonal ingredients.

settings.title: The Shops Team
settings.subtitle: BARISTAS
settings.copy: A loyal bunch who get their kicks from service – not sales – our baristas bring bags of personality to the bar. Hailing from all over the globe, but united by their love for good coffee, when they're not partying with us you'll find them performing, studying and travelling.

settings.title: THE MARKETERS
settings.subtitle: OUR RAG TAG BAND
settings.copy:
Assembled of a glorious mish-mash of markeeters spanning over 30 years experience in Food and Drink. Roisin, Ben, Holly & Jo make up our hit squad.

With experience in everything from making startups household names, and penning published novels, they're the brains (and the braun) behind everything 'except' the coffee.

settings.title: Swap, skip or stop as you need
SUBSCRIBE & SAVE
settings.subtitle: Stick to your party classics or mix it up on the reg – you decide. Plus, you'll get 10% off every delivery, free shipping, and the flexibility to skip or stop as you need.

settings.title: WANT US TO SUPPLY YOUR CAFE OR BUSINESS?
settings.subtitle: Drop us a line below and we'll send one of the team your way.
